text: basic example shows … ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples.
code: library(fieldprintr)  candyland <- read_ftm_cd(     "data-raw/12-09-2022-1234_Comprehensive_Data_Candyland_Farms.xlsx") #> New names: #> • `` -> `...91`  head(candyland) #> # A tibble: 6 × 422 #>   grower_id field_name      field_size_ac farm_serial_number tract_number #>   <chr>     <chr>                   <dbl>              <dbl>        <dbl> #> 1 432       10                       22.8                 NA        14634 #> 2 441       5a & 5b                  59.9                 NA        12254 #> 3 427       Bubblegum 1 & 2          41.6                 NA         5582 #> 4 427       Bubblegum 11             43.4                 NA        16327 #> 5 427       Bubblegum 13             20.7                 NA        16327 #> 6 427       Bubblegum 17N            14.5                 NA        16327 #> # ℹ 417 more variables: field_number <chr>, location <chr>, state <chr>, #> #   field_geo_json <chr>, crop_year <chr>, crop <chr>, last_modified_on <dttm>, #> #   metric_version <chr>, adjusted_yield <dbl>, adjusted_yield_units <chr>, #> #   land_use_score_acre_yield_units <dbl>, total_soil_loss_year <dbl>, #> #   soil_conservation_score_ton_acre_year <dbl>, #> #   water_erosion_ton_acre_year <dbl>, wind_erosion_ton_acre_year <dbl>, #> #   total_sci_points <dbl>, soil_carbon <dbl>, …

title: read_ftm_cd — read_ftm_cd
text: wrapper function standardizes import Comprehensive Data (CD) output file, file exported Field Market Fieldprint Platform Excel .xlsx file.

title: read_ftm_cd — read_ftm_cd
text: file .xlsx comprehensive data output file exported Fieldprint sheet sheet .xlsx file read (default = "Report Data")

title: read_ftm_cd — read_ftm_cd
text: original name .xlsx CD file may formatted like "MM-DD-YYYY-####_Comprehensive_Data_My_Farm.xlsx". Regardless, read_ftm_cd() function looks sheet "Report Data", exported Fieldprint Platform.
